verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I believed, for the which I spoke.
You are working Your will within me,
That I might believe, believe only in You.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I know, there is power in Your name,
And you are working Your will within me,
That I might believe, believe only in You.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Often in tribulation, yet not in anguish,
Pressed beyond measure, yet not despairing,
Persecuted, never forsaken,
Cast down and yet never destroyed.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
For herein is my faith,
I will escape,
To the mountains of safety on high.
These trials are working in me
A more excellent sure weight of glory.
For herein is my faith,
I will go on,
Over waters obscuring the pathway.
After my Lord and my Savior,
I'll go. And I will cross over.
For herein is my faith.
